actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide additional authority for the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to prescribe standards of conduct, and to authorize investigation of, and arrests for, crimes committed, on lands and in buildings under the jurisdiction of the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Provides additional authority for the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to prescribe standards of conduct, and to authorize investigation of, and arrests for, crimes committed, on lands and in buildings under the jurisdiction of the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional authority for the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to prescribe standards of conduct, and to authorize investigation of, and arrests for, crimes committed, on lands and in buildings under the jurisdiction of the Veterans' Administration.
